comments.author: Liou
comments.content:
I wonder how many gaman cultures there are outside of Japan. Not many, probably a couple of islands or remote areas.

There is always one to fuck it up though, so don't forget to get rid of all the immigrants

P.S. Why don't you automatically post these things on your FB account? Or is this for a more select crowd? That'd be strange as it's on the internet.

comments.author: randy
comments.content: It's quite the opposite. I post everything of value here. Facebook just receives brainfarts. I tend not to share this stuff on Facebook because I think it will get annoying. I knew of one guy on Facebook who kept promoting his own blog every single day. I had to turn him off.

comments.author: randy
comments.content: By the way, I saw a foreigner today. I felt unsafe around him :P
